I have played every other game of Counter Strike and I can easily say that this is the best game so far. The CS:GO is fine with the graphics and shit, but CS:Source is the game with ultimate graphics and real-raw, real-life, real-rage gaming for all the hardcore Counter Strike fans around the world!

Whatever they did with the new VAC system completely sucks. I am no cheater and I can't join a single server. And guess what, you will have to complete a ridicuolus number of steps that may or may not fix the problem. And the steps are not even issued by Valve, they're on community forums. Yes, that is correct, after you've purchased the game it will still not work, and to get it to work you'll have to complete several steps written by a random guy on the internet and those may still not work. And, even more so, those steps include excluding your Steam folder from AV scans, which pretty much makes your PC vulnerable to any virus that decides that saving itself within your Steam folder is a smart idea.
Basically, at this point, fk you, Valve.
If I could get a moneyback on all the games that use this new VAC bull 5h17 - I definetely would.

Как и в оригинальной версии игры, в Counter-Strike: Sourcе друг другу противостоят команда контртеррористов (CT, спецназа) и команда террористов (Т) в серии раундов.
Каждый раунд выигрывается посредством выполнения определённой миссии, такой как подрыв бомбы или спасение заложников либо после уничтожения всех членов вражеской команды.

Компьютерная игра, многопользовательский командный шутер от первого лица, разработанный компаниями Valve и Turtle Rock Studios; ремейк Counter-Strike, модификации 1999 года для игры Half-Life. Построенная на игровом движке Source, игра была выпущена в 2004 году изначально в комплекте с Half-Life 2, однако позже появились и отдельные её издания.

En mi opinión, el mejor Counter Strike después del Global Offensive, obviamente. Viene a ser como una versión intermedia entre el primer Counter Strike (ya que mejora de forma notable el apartado gráfico) y el Counter Strike Global Offensive (que no lo supera pero se le acerca un poco).

我认为起源是CS系列最优秀的一代（当然，竞技性与CS1.6相比就差很多了。不过，手感是最好的）。为什么呢，因为其画质不差于csgo，
而配置要求也不高，这是一代Source™引擎的最大优点。
但是，我想问：为什么没有创意工坊啊！Valve你多开一个workshop不会死吧，我玩盗版的时候找模组与地图很辛苦的！
而且我替换人物模组后，开始游戏弹出一堆英文，说什么什么anna……总之就是素材之类的东西。为什么呀，G胖给个解释呗！
但我还是很推荐，什么CrossFire（CF）之类的垃圾游戏手感太差了。
顺便一提，CS1.6真心有点贵。虽然是我心中的经典，但还是有点贵了。

I think CS Source was the origin of the best generation (of course, competitive compared with CS1.6 is far worse. However, feel is the best). Why, because of its poor quality in csgo,
And configuration requirements is not high also, this is the generation of the Source ™ engine one of the biggest advantages.
But, I want to ask: why are there no creative workshop! Valve you rolled a workshop will not die, when I play pirated find module and the map very hard!
And after I replace characters module, start the game pop up a pile of English, said what what Anna... In short is material and things like that. Why ah, Gabe Newell please give a explanation bai!
But what I recommend, CrossFire (CF) such as garbage game feel terrible.

By the way，I think Cs1.6 is a little expensive。Although CS1.6 is classic but still a little expensive
